mobile.name: john lumberjack
mobile.long_descr: John the Lumberjack is here, looking for some trees to chop down.
mobile.description:
He is six feet tall and looks quite strong, muscles bulging under his heavy,
chequered shirt.  His features are worn with hard work and his expression is
one of a peaceful man leading a simple life.

mobile.name: bear
mobile.long_descr: A big, brown, angry-looking bear is here.
mobile.description:
The bear is a big, brown, furry animal with very large claws and very sharp
teeth.  It doesn't resemble those cute little thingies from toy shops at all.

mobile.name: rabbit
mobile.long_descr: A ferocious rabbit is here, glaring hungrily at you.
mobile.description:
This small, furry creature with long ears and big feet has been attacked by
the dreaded rabbit rabies, a horrible disease that turns helpless and innocent
rabbits into ferocious and bloodthirsty monsters.

mobile.name: deer
mobile.long_descr: A fallow deer is grazing peacefully here.
mobile.description:
She is a graceful creature on long, slender legs, and with large, brown eyes
looking back at you with an air of watchful interest.

mobile.name: fox
mobile.long_descr: A brown fox is here, looking for some rabbits to chew up.
mobile.description: It is a large fox with beautiful, red-brown fur and a long, thick brush.

mobile.name: warg vicious
mobile.long_descr: A vicious warg is here, snarling angrily at you.
mobile.description:
It is an exceptionally large wolf with thick, black fur.  Saliva is dripping
quickly from its long, white fangs.  It looks quite dangerous and very angry.

mobile.name: warg ferocious
mobile.long_descr: A ferocious warg is here, snarling angrily at you.
mobile.description:
It is an exceptionally large wolf with thick, black fur.  Saliva is dripping
quickly from its long, white fangs.  It looks quite dangerous and very angry.

mobile.name: wolf grey
mobile.long_descr: A large, grey wolf is here, glaring hungrily at you.
mobile.description: The large, grey wolf eyes you with interest while licking its lips.

mobile.name: wolf black
mobile.long_descr: A large, black wolf is here, glaring hungrily at you.
mobile.description: The large, black wolf eyes you with interest while licking its lips.

mobile.name: dragon green
mobile.long_descr: A huge green dragon is here, its narrow yellow eyes glowing with rage.
mobile.description:
This enormous winged serpent has dark green scales covering most of its
colossal body.  Numerous holes in its heavy wings tell of many fights as does
the nicks in the horns on its head.  It smells as disgusting as only dragons
do.

mobile.name: shargugh brownie
mobile.long_descr: Shargugh the Forest Brownie is here, grinning broadly at you.
mobile.description:
This little fellow is only three foot tall with wild matted brown hair and long
tangled brown beard.  He wears ragged brown and green clothing and looks as if
he is having great fun.

mobile.name: elder druid
mobile.long_descr: The elder druid is here ... he looks very upset at your presence in his home.
mobile.description:
The druid looks quite old.  You would think him venerable, but you know
he would be a tough foe.
